description: This is a Volunteer Management website. Anyone can become a volunteer through this website. Just by filling a short form.
featured1: Volunteer Opportunities & Event Management: Search for opportunities, sign up for events, and manage events in real-time.
featured2: Data Management: Securely store data with MongoDB and generate insightful analytics and reports.
featured3: Interactive UI: Enjoy a responsive, user-friendly design built with Tailwind CSS and React.

description: This is a Gaming Review website. Here anyone can give a review about any game and see the reviews of others. You can also watch gaming review videos here.
featured1: Review Submission: Authenticated users can submit, edit, and delete reviews
featured2: Game WatchList: Users can manage their watchlist, adding and removing games they are interested in.
featured3: Responsive Design and Sorting Options: Tailwind CSS for a clean, responsive layout; users can sort reviews by rating, year, etc.

description: If there is a discount on the product of any e-commerce site, you will get the code on this website. You can use that code to get the discount.
